snippet: As stock funds have foundered, some municipal bond funds have posted big returns for the first nine months of this year.
lead_paragraph: As stock funds have foundered, some municipal bond funds have posted big returns for the first nine months of this year.

headline.main: Muni Bonds Are Stars, for Now
headline.print_headline: Muni Bonds Are Stars, for Now
headline.seo: Municipal Bonds Are on a Tear, but for How Long?
